trans-unit.resname: OVOC·1 | Millicent, Restless Revenant | Card Name
OVOC·1 | Millicent, Restless Revenant | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Spirit you control.
trans-unit.target: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Spirit you control.

trans-unit.resname: OVOC·1 | Millicent, Restless Revenant | Card Text | Paragraph 2
OVOC·1 | Millicent, Restless Revenant | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME or another nontoken Spirit you control dies or deals combat damage to a player, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
trans-unit.target: Whenever CARDNAME or another nontoken Spirit you control dies or deals combat damage to a player, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

trans-unit.resname: OVOC·2 | Strefan, Maurer Progenitor | Card Name
OVOC·2 | Strefan, Maurer Progenitor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
OVOC·2 | Strefan, Maurer Progenitor | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, create a Blood token for each player who lost life this turn.
trans-unit.target: At the beginning of your end step, create a Blood token for each player who lost life this turn.

trans-unit.resname: OVOC·2 | Strefan, Maurer Progenitor | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever Strefan attacks, you may sacrifice two Blood tokens. If you do, you may put a Vampire card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped and attacking. It gains indestructible until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: Whenever Strefan attacks, you may sacrifice two Blood tokens. If you do, you may put a Vampire card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped and attacking. It gains indestructible until end of turn.
